tool_description: Calculates the comprehensive financial impact of returns including refund amounts, processing costs, and lost revenue.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs for financial analysis

include_processing_costs.description: Whether to include return processing operational costs

include_shipping_costs.description: Whether to include return shipping costs in calculations

currency.description: Currency for financial calculations: USD, EUR, GBP, CAD

error_messages: Missing financial data: Unable to retrieve pricing or cost information for some return items
Invalid currency: Use one of [USD, EUR, GBP, CAD]
Calculation error: Unable to compute financial impact due to missing or invalid financial data
usage: Provide return_ids to calculate financial impact. Enable include_processing_costs and include_shipping_costs to get comprehensive cost analysis. Specify currency for accurate financial reporting.

net_financial_impact.description: Overall financial impact including all costs
